issue.title: [CI] Spark integration build failing (StackOverflow error while building SQL Catalyst)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12817](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12817). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
_Exception when compiling 474 sources to /spark/sql/catalyst/target/scala-2.12/classes_
See https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2597929901#step:7:9761

This appeared for the 1st time on 2021-05-13, and previous to the error we see 'o dependency information available' warnings (https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/2597929901#step:7:9627)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12817?focusedCommentId=17503087) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
The spark integration builds are currently passing, so going to close this assuming this is fixed in the meantime.
